poem:
Title: "Shadow and Light Amid Unrest"

Tossed like bones, words in the paper sing -
Israel stiffens, Gaza trembles,
A dance of nations in the early morning ding.

Petitions for peace, words become embers,
an unfinished game of chess,
In each pawn's cry, humanity remembers.

War feeds on sacrifice, Love feasts on love,
Around the globe, we echo the dove.
